info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:19PM EDT until June 16 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHESTERFIELD...NORTH CENTRAL AMELIA AND POWHATAN COUNTIES... At 219 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ballsville, or near Powhatan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Macon around 225 PM EDT. Powhatan around 230 PM EDT. Chula around 240 PM EDT. Moseley around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Goodwins Store, Flat Rock, Skinquarter, Pilkinton, Belona, Holly Hills, Lodore, Lake Powhatan, Giles Mill and Clayville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
